CustomField.formula: IF ( TEXT ( Worst_PA_Survey__c ) = "5", IMAGE("/img/samples/rating1.gif", "Yes", 12, 12), IF ( TEXT ( Worst_PA_Survey__c ) = "4", IMAGE("/img/samples/rating2.gif", "Yes", 12, 12), IF ( TEXT ( Worst_PA_Survey__c ) = "3", IMAGE("/img/samples/rating3.gif", "Yes", 12, 12), IF ( TEXT ( Worst_PA_Survey__c ) = "2", IMAGE("/img/samples/rating4.gif", "Yes", 12, 12), IF ( TEXT ( Worst_PA_Survey__c ) = "1", IMAGE("/img/samples/rating5.gif", "Yes", 12, 12), "" ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Survey
